card_text_image.heading: Decks and Technical Detail
card_text_image.text: The MAJ Oceanic is a motorsailer, handcrafted in Bira, Sulawesi, in the traditional style of a Phinisi. It measures 47 meters in length overall with 10,5 meters beam.
